channel.title: open-jam-2020 on Open Jam
channel.description: Recent content in open-jam-2020 on Open Jam

item.title: Open Jam 2020 Recap
item.description: Open Jam 2020 was the second Open Jam. For 80 hours, from September 18-21st, Open Jammers made twenty-seven open source games, using open source tools. The theme was AIRBORNE. After a round of peer voting, the results are in! First place goes to: Jurassic Snowpark Created by Alligator Ventures; in this game you play as a snowboarding dinosaur. Take to the slopes, earn money to buy upgrades for your snowboard.

item.title: Open Jam 2020 theme announcement
item.description: The theme for Open Jam 2020 is…. AIRBORNE!!! Join the jam at Open Jam 2020!
